# Maths Flow Package

![flow](https://img.shields.io/badge/Flow-6.0-blue.svg?labelColor=000000&color=FFFFFF&logo=data:image/png;base64,)
[![python-version](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3.8%2B-blue)]()
[![wemake-python-styleguide](https://img.shields.io/badge/style-wemake-29cd43.svg)](https://github.com/wemake-services/wemake-python-styleguide)
[![black](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg)](https://github.com/psf/black)

A Package of Maths Python Flow Components

## Components

This package includes general mathematical components. This includes arithmetic, logarithmic, exponential and trigonometric components.

## Installation

This package comes pre-installed in Flow. No need to install!

## Tests

All component tests can be found in the `tests` folder

## Contributing

We welcome contributions to expand our package capabilities! If you would like to contribute maths components to this repo, please fork, modify as desired and create a PR. This will be reviewed by a member of the team

Please try to follow our code style by using mypy, black and flake8 with the wemake-python-styleguide plugin. Pre-commit can be used to fix many minor code style violations.

Please add tests for your new component to the `tests` folder

If you have any questions, or want to contribute a component but don't know how to do some of the things mentioned above, feel free to contact the team or open a PR so a discussion can be started!
